document.full_text: nato said on friday its aircraft probably killed rebels in a "friendly fire" incident on thursday near the oil port of brega but defended its libya campaign, saying it was stepping up operations.
document.title: nato says likely hit rebels by mistake, defends libya campaign
lines_and_colors: nato said on friday its aircraft probably killed rebels in a "friendly fire" incident on thursday near the oil port of brega but defended its libya campaign, saying it was stepping up operations.
